intent_atoms.description: Provide contextual status labels for parsing outcomes to allow operators to distinguish issue severity at a glance.
Thread tolerant parsing status metadata (Invalid, Empty, Corrupted, Partial, Trimmed) must be displayed through the outline rows and detail inspector.

functional_units.name: Placeholder Nodes for Missing Children
functional_units.description: Creates synthetic nodes to represent expected but absent child structures in the outline.

functional_units.name: Contextual Status Labels
functional_units.description: Displays thread‑tolerant parsing status metadata (Invalid, Empty, Corrupted, Partial, Trimmed) on outline rows and detail inspector for operators.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Verifies that focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.

functional_units.name: Real‑World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secures licensing for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4, and MPEG‑H fixtures to replace synthetic payloads in regression baselines.
